text: Jordan Pena (born May 21, 2000) is an American soccer player who plays as a midfielder for FC Tucson on loan from Real Monarchs in the USL Championship. == Career == On February 14, 2019, Pena signed for USL Championship side Real Monarchs, after previously playing with the Real Salt Lake academy. On September 15, 2020, Pena joined USL League One side FC Tucson on loan for the remainder of the season. == References == == External links == * Real Salt Lake Jordan Pena | Real Salt Lake Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Tucson players Category:People from Payson, Utah Category:Real Monarchs players Category:Soccer players from Utah Category:USL Championship players
title: Jordan Pena
